name: Fundamentals of Programming
description: Introduction to programming concepts and problem-solving techniques.

lessons.name: Introduction to Programming
lessons.description: Basic concepts of programming languages and problem-solving strategies.

lessons.name: Variables and Data Types
lessons.description: Understanding variables, data types, and basic operations.

lessons.name: Control Structures
lessons.description: Understanding conditional statements and loops.

name: Programming in Python
description: Advanced programming concepts and Python language features.

lessons.name: Advanced Data Structures
lessons.description: Working with advanced data structures in Python.

lessons.name: Object-Oriented Programming
lessons.description: Understanding classes, objects, and inheritance in Python.

lessons.name: File Handling and Modules
lessons.description: Reading from and writing to files, and creating Python modules.

name: Introduction to Acting
description: Basic principles of acting and performance techniques.

lessons.name: Theater History
lessons.description: Overview of the history of theater and acting.

lessons.name: Acting Techniques
lessons.description: Exploration of various acting techniques and methods.

lessons.name: Character Development
lessons.description: Understanding how to develop and portray characters.

name: Introduction to Directing
description: Fundamentals of directing and stage management.

lessons.name: Directing Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to the principles of directing.

lessons.name: Blocking and Staging
lessons.description: Understanding blocking and staging techniques.

lessons.name: Rehearsal Management
lessons.description: Managing rehearsals and coordinating actors.

name: Introduction to Playwriting
description: Basic principles of playwriting and script development.

lessons.name: Story Structure
lessons.description: Understanding the structure of dramatic storytelling.

lessons.name: Character Creation
lessons.description: Developing compelling characters for stage or screen.

lessons.name: Dialogue Writing
lessons.description: Crafting engaging and authentic dialogue for scripts.

name: Introduction to Stage Management
description: Fundamentals of stage management and production coordination.

lessons.name: Stage Management Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to the role and responsibilities of stage managers.

lessons.name: Production Planning
lessons.description: Planning and organizing productions and rehearsals.

lessons.name: Technical Rehearsals
lessons.description: Coordinating technical aspects during rehearsals and performances.

name: Introduction to Lighting Design
description: Basic principles of lighting design and stage illumination.

lessons.name: Lighting Design Theory
lessons.description: Understanding the principles and theory of lighting design.

lessons.name: Lighting Instruments
lessons.description: Introduction to lighting instruments and equipment.

lessons.name: Lighting Design Practical
lessons.description: Practical application of lighting design concepts.

name: Introduction to Sound Design
description: Fundamentals of sound design and audio production.

lessons.name: Sound Design Principles
lessons.description: Understanding the principles and aesthetics of sound design.

lessons.name: Sound Editing Techniques
lessons.description: Techniques for editing and manipulating audio recordings.

lessons.name: Sound Mixing and Production
lessons.description: Mixing and producing audio for various media formats.
